text: Archibald Mogwe (29 August 1921 â€“ 25 February 2021) was a Botswana politician. From 1974 until 1984, he was the Minister of Foreign Affairs. From 1985 until 1994, he was Minister of Mineral Resources and Water Affairs. He was born in Kanye, Botswana. Mogwe died on 25 February 2021 at the age of 99. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Botswana politicians
title: Archibald Mogwe
